Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: primal wish
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] desires a simple life. So simple, some might comment, that it is suited more for an animal than a human. Indeed, [PAWN_nameDef] does envy animals, and would rather be one than human.

li.messageText: Upon becoming a morph, {PAWN_nameDef} has gained a 'primal wish'. {PAWN_pronoun} might want to go even further with their mutations...

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: beastmaster
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes the company of animals who were once people, and feels more at ease being around them.
